Handmade %100 Handmade Handmade leather is a traditional craft that involves creating leather goods by hand. Each item is unique and has its own character due to variations in the natural material. The crafting process ensures high-quality and durable items such as wallets, bags, belts, and shoes. Handmade leather goods are becoming popular as consumers seek out sustainable, long-lasting products. By supporting artisans who practice this craft, we can help preserve this traditional skill and create lasting products for generations to come. Traditional method Handmade leather wallets are crafted using traditional methods. Artisans carefully select high-quality leather and cut it by hand. They stitch the wallets together using hand sewing techniques. The edges are meticulously finished, and attention is given to every detail. As a result, handmade leather wallets are both durable and aesthetically pleasing.

Material Our product are made of natural full grain leather. "Full-grain leather" is a type of leather that includes the top layer of the hide. Therefore, full-grain leather is more durable, long-lasting, and resistant to wear than other types of leather. Full grain leather is the highest quality and most natural form of leather. It utilizes the top layer or outermost layer of the hide, resulting in a unique appearance. It comes with natural patterns, scratches, and signs of aging. Compared to other types of leather, it is more durable and resistant to wear and tear. Being filled with natural fibers, it offers greater longevity. Full grain leather is breathable, preventing sweat and moisture buildup. Over time, it develops a beautiful patina that enhances its value. Wallets, bags, and other products made from full grain leather are not only durable but also visually appealing.

Hand-Stitched Hand-Stitched Durability: Hand-stitched wallets are more durable than machine-stitched wallets as hand-stitching creates a tighter and stronger stitch that can withstand daily wear and tear.Quality: Hand-stitching is a sign of quality craftsmanship. It shows that the maker has taken the time and effort to carefully craft each stitch, resulting in a high-quality product.Timelessness: Hand-stitched wallets have a timeless appeal that never goes out of style. They have a classic, artisanal look that can be appreciated for years to come. We asked Chat Gpt about the Durability of hand stitched Wallets and bags stitched by hand are durable for several reasons: Strong Stitching: Wallets and bags sewn by hand are constructed with stronger and more durable stitches. These stitches perform better during use and daily wear. While machine stitching may be faster, hand stitching requires more craftsmanship, resulting in a more robust outcome.Flexibility: Hand stitching helps preserve the natural flexibility of the material. Particularly with materials like leather that are rigid or thick, hand stitching allows for better stretching and shaping. This prevents deformation over time and contributes to a longer lifespan for the bag or wallet.Fine-tuning: Hand stitching enables better control over stitch density and tension. This ensures that the stitches are even and balanced. In machine stitching, inconsistencies in stitch tightness or looseness can occur, making the stitches more prone to unraveling or breaking. Handmade leather is a traditional craft that involves creating leather goods by hand. Each item is unique and has its own character due to variations in the natural material. The crafting process ensures high-quality and durable items such as wallets, bags, belts, and shoes. Handmade leather goods are becoming popular as consumers seek out sustainable, long-lasting products. By supporting artisans who practice this craft, we can help preserve this traditional skill and create lasting products for generations to come.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A beautiful bag!
reviews.reviewText: This was a gift!! My step mom absolutely loved it!! It’s a beautiful bag w beautiful art work and the genuine leather smell. Would definitely recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought First in Purple, second purchase!!! So well made!!🥳🥳

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, Simple, Small Leather Purse
reviews.reviewText: I really loved the quality of the leather and the craftsmanship. The staining and stitching was professionally done. I feel that the metal buckles are adequate, but for I feel they could have been better quality. I was surprised to see the inside is not lined, however, with this purse it isn't necessary as the leather is really beautiful by itself. There is ample space to store cards, coins, and even a large iphone 13 pro max with bulky case. My biggest complaint is the price seems high for what you get. I would love to give this as a gift, but the price prevents me from doing so.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Arrived with a horrible smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable rustic purse with authentic leather appearance.
reviews.reviewText: Carved Dark Brown Purse---I like cross body purses that give me freedom of movement with my purse still feeling secure. I walk an active dog twice a day, and my current purse is nylon and utilitarian-looking. This purse looked like a great upgrade to my everyday gear.The Good:• The purse is great looking. You can tell at first glance that the construction is quality and the leather is genuine.• The purse carries just enough for my needs.• The strap is long enough to be worn cross-body with my larges winter coat, and the strap is adjustable.The Bad:• NothingThe “Could Be Better:”• Two days after using the purse, I noticed the surface of the leather at the “bend” where the hardware attaches to the strap beginning to show signs of surface wear. I know that leather will show age in this way. But a different type of leather at wear-points in the strap might not wear so quickly.GRADESPrice: A __This seems right for a carve-leather purse.Ease of use: A __Easy to wear cross-body, even with a large coat. It is the right size for what I like to carry.Performance: B __The strap wear is expected, but seems to be occurring quickly.I like the look of this purse. It will not be my every day dog-walking purse, but it will be my weekend purse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smudges on your clothing from the strap and not completely sewn together on the sides
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Very cute purse the only thing I don't like is the leather dust rubs off on your clothing from the strap and be careful of putting anything of value in the inside due to the sides aren't sewn together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Crossbody Shoulder Bag. Sturdy Leather. Giftable.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this cross-body shoulder bag as a gift for my wife. She likes it very much. I could end the review here, because, well, she likes it, and that's an important outcome of a gift. Nevertheless, I'll share my impressions.The bag is made of genuine leather. It's the kind of sturdy leather that you find on high-quality, handmade purses, wallets, briefcases, and the like. You know when you feel it and sense its weight. It's the sort of leather that only improves with age, and should last a long time.Aside from the quality craftsmanship, it has four separate areas inside to carry various items. The outer section would be a good place for a mobile phone, and it's big enough for a large (Max) iPhone. Then, there's a zippered compartment with a leather tassel on the zipper pull. The third compartment is open, with four protected slots for credit cards, driver's license, or other ID. The fourth compartment, slightly narrower than the rest, is good for smaller items. The inside is all leather, with no fabric lining.The carrying strap is also made of relatively thick leather. The strap is attached with a solid clip for easy removal, allowing it to be used as a clutch purse. The length of the strap is adjustable.For the handmade quality, features, and attention to detail, I think it is well priced.
